矕字的基本解释

矕
mǎn
看：“顾视窗壁间，亲戚竞觇矕。”
目美貌。
披，覆盖：“矕龙虎之文。”
目生翳。

矕
mán
目昏暗。

矕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǎn］
［《廣韻》武板切，上潸，明。］
［《集韻》毋版切，上潸，明。］
(1)视；观看。
(2)被；披。

矕字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　矕； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页821第10
【唐韻】武版切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】母版切，?蠻上聲。【說文】目矕矕也。【類篇】目美貌。　又【博雅】視也。【廣韻】視貌。【后漢·馬融·廣成頌】右矕三塗。【韓愈·贈張籍詩】親戚相覘矕。　又被也。【班固·答賔戲】矕龍虎之文舊矣。　又【集韻】謨官切，音瞞。亦視也。【文選·馬融·長笛賦】長矕遠引。李善讀。　又謨還切。音蠻。目暗也。　又盧丸切，音巒。目昏也。

矕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
矕字的起名意思

暂无。

矕
Basic explanation of words
矕
mǎn
Look at: "Gu window wall, relatives are vying to watch."
Beautiful eyes.
Cover, cover: "The text of the dragon and tiger."
Eyes give birth to shadows.
矕
mán
The eyes are dim.
矕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mǎn］
["Guangyun" Wu board cut, Shanglu, Ming. ]
["Jiyun" is not cut, Shanglu, Ming. ]
(1) See; watch.
(2) Was; draped.
矕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Title Department] 　矕; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 821 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Wu version cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Master cut,? Very sound. [Said the text] The head is 矕矕 also. 【Classes】Beautiful and beautiful.　[Bo Ya] See also. [Guang Yun] Appearance. 【Later Han·Ma Rong·Guangcheng Song】Three coatings on the right. [Han Yu·Poems from Zhang Ji] Relatives look at each other.　Being again. [Ban Gu·A Bladder Opera] The text of the dragon and tiger is old.　[Jiyun] Moguan cuts, and the sound is concealed. See also. 【Selected Works·Ma Rong·Flute Fu】Chang Qi Yuan cited. Li Shandu.　 Youmo still cut. Sound man. My eyes are dark.　Lu Maru cut again, Yinluan. Look dizzy.
矕
